scripts.render: yarn render:googledot-blue && yarn render:googledot-black && yarn render:googledot-white && yarn render:googledot-red yarn render:google-yellow-transparent-crosshair
scripts.build:googledot-blue: ctgen build.toml -d 'bitmaps/GoogleDot-Blue' -n 'GoogleDot-Blue' -c 'Blue cursor theme inspired on Google'
scripts.build:googledot-black: ctgen build.toml -d 'bitmaps/GoogleDot-Black' -n 'GoogleDot-Black' -c 'Black cursor theme inspired on Google'
scripts.build:googledot-white: ctgen build.toml -d 'bitmaps/GoogleDot-White' -n 'GoogleDot-White' -c 'White cursor theme inspired on Google'
scripts.build:googledot-red: ctgen build.toml -d 'bitmaps/GoogleDot-Red' -n 'GoogleDot-Red' -c 'Red cursor theme inspired on Google'
scripts.build:googledot-yellow-transparent-cross: ctgen build.toml -d 'bitmaps/GoogleDot-Yellow-Transparent-Crosshair' -n 'GoogleDot-Yellow-Transparent-Crosshair' -c 'Transparent yellow cursor with crosshair theme inspired on Google'
scripts.build: yarn build:googledot-blue && yarn build:googledot-black && yarn build:googledot-white && yarn build:googledot-red yarn build:googledot-yellow-transparent-crosshair
